metadata.synopsis: In this devastating and insightful investigative docu-thriller, Oscar-nominated director Adam Benzine examines the central failures made by the U.S. government across the first 90 days of the COVID-19 outbreak, which allowed an emerging pandemic to become a national catastrophe.

reviews: Benzine's project acts as an explainer. It doesn't just present the Trump administration's disastrous incompetence in the face of the novel coronavirus, but digs into the reasons for that incompetence, both ideologically and strategically.
The Curve... sounds like a horror-movie title and in many ways plays out as one, albeit a real-life terror.
A takedown of a lying president for his incompetent management of Covid in America.
